messages.content: Hello! As an AI language model, I don't have feelings in the same way that humans do, but I'm functioning properly and here to assist you with any questions or tasks you may have. How can I assist you today?
I have anxiety and hypochondria. Can you please suggest me a technique to distract when I get a panick attack?

One technique that can help with anxiety and panick attacks is deep breathing. You can also try to focus on something else, such as your surroundings or a task at hand, to help take your mind off of the anxious thoughts. It is important to remember that these attacks are often situational and will pass with time.
